alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Union (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 17 at 10:51AM EST until January 17 at 6:28PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Shawneetown. .River levels are falling and are expected to drop below flood stage at Shawneetown later today. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Ohio River at Shawneetown. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Monday the stage was 33.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning. - Flood stage is 33.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
